title: Metro.Last.Light-RELOADED
description:
Metro Last Light

Game Info:

It Is the Year 2034. 

Beneath the ruins of post-apocalyptic Moscow, in the tunnels of the Metro,
the remnants of mankind are besieged by deadly threats from outside and
within. Mutants stalk the catacombs beneath the desolate surface, and hunt
amidst the poisoned skies above. 

But rather than stand united, the station-cities of the Metro are locked in a
struggle for the ultimate power, a doomsday device from the military vaults
of D6. A civil war is stirring that could wipe humanity from the face of the
earth forever. 

As Artyom, burdened by guilt but driven by hope, you hold the key to our
survival the last light in our darkest hour 

Features
* A gripping, story-driven first person shooter, Metro: Last Light is the 
hugely anticipated sequel to 2010's critically acclaimed cult classic 
Metro 2033 
* Explore the post-apocalyptic world of the Moscow Metro, one of the most 
immersive, atmospheric game worlds ever created 

Game Info:

1. Unrar.
2. Burn or mount the image.
3. Install the game. 
4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
your game install directory.
5. Play the game.
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
